p: The full length of large yellow croaker elovl6 cDNA consisted of 1360 bp that contained an ORF of 810 bp encoding a putative protein of 269 amino acid (AA) ( Figure 1). BLAST analysis of deduced amino acid sequence indicated that Elovl6 in large yellow croaker shared high sequence identity with Elovl6 from a variety of teleosts, such as Lates calcarifer (97%), Oreochromis niloticus (97%), Salmo salar (95%), Oncorhynchus mykiss (95%), Cyprinus carpio (93%), and Danio rerio (93%).
